extension.title: Medal system
extension.description: Assign medals and rewards to users.
extension.author: om
extension.note: HTTP server must have write access into 'img' folder inside extension. Otherwise you won't be able to define medales.
All users rewards will be removed during the uninstall process. It is strongly recommended you to disable "Medals system" extension instead or to upgrade it without uninstalling.
